name: This Changes Everything
description:
Entry for My First Game Jam: Summer 2022

CONTROLS
Move - Arrow Keys/WASD
Interact/Shoot - Z

This Changes Everything is a short game experience designed to cross game genres and explore what I can do with GB Studio. Developed in two weeks by my little solo-dev self for My First Game Jam (it's actually my second game jam, but they said that's okay). With this sketch of a game, I wanted to explore the idea of a game where everything changes with the push of a button. It has just a touch of narrative, a sprinkling of game mechanics and I hope you enjoy it!

Game developed by Laurie Noel
Art by Laurie Noel and the GB Studio Tutorial Game

(Music wasn't within the scope of the jam, but this is a nice listen while playing.)

Recommendation: play with some notepaper handy. If controls don't seem to work on launch, try clicking inside the game window.

If you experience any bugs please let me know! 

Enjoyed what I made? Say thanks with a ko-fi. I am fueled by caffeine
Join me on tumblr for game and pixel updates
